meanings.definition: To color or paint with vermilion.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys vermilioning her artwork to make it stand out.
meanings.sent2: The artist spent hours vermilioning the intricate details of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The children had fun vermilioning their faces with paint during the art class.
meanings.sent4: His passion for vermilioning the world with beauty was evident in every stroke.
meanings.sent5: The sunset vermilioning the sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The act of applying vermilion to something.
meanings.sent1: The vermilioning of the temple walls brought a vibrant touch to the ancient structure.
meanings.sent2: She admired the delicate vermilioning on the traditional masks.
meanings.sent3: The vermilioning of the cupcakes made them look too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The vermilioning of the map highlighted the important routes for the travelers.
meanings.sent5: The vermilioning of the costume added a festive flair to the parade.
